commentList.content: My experience was good. The service was also good except for the communication barrier. The workers there were nice. The room was clean but dusty. However, I would still recommend the place to my friends, and I hope to visit again in the future.

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest: Thank you very much for your affirmation of the store's service. The store is only 450 meters away from Suzhouqiao Subway Station (Line 16) and only takes 10 minutes to walk. There are all kinds of restaurants nearby the store, which is very convenient; it is also a short distance from Renmin University and Beijing The University of Foreign Studies is within a 10-minute drive and the location is very convenient. The store is one of the few stores nearby that has its own parking lot. The store is free for hotel guests and has ample parking spaces.

commentList.translatedContent: Highly recommended. The service attitude is very high. They took the initiative to help me collect the express delivery and store my luggage. There are mints at the front desk that you can take and eat at any time. Take one when you have a taste in your mouth to relieve the embarrassment. In short, it is highly recommended.
commentList.content: 超級推薦，服務態度非常滿分，主動幫我收快遞，寄存行李，前台有薄荷糖，隨時可以拿着吃，嘴裏有味的時候來一個，緩解尷尬，總之很推薦。

commentList.translatedContent: I stayed at the All Seasons Zhongguancun Suzhou Bridge for two nights. The hotel is clean and fresh. The room is not big but very warm. Especially the two front desk staff are polite and considerate. Especially Xiaomiao gave me a lot of help and made me feel like home. Feelings, thank you!
commentList.content: 全季中關村蘇州橋店住了兩晚，酒店整潔清新，房間不大但很温馨，尤其是兩位前台，彬彬有禮服務周到，特別是小苗給了我很大幫助，讓我有家一樣的感受，謝謝啦！
